caption.title: Box and whisker plots of log viral load change (test 2-test 1) in EDTA and PPT samples at 4°C, 20°C and 30°C: All samples with detectable viral load >19 copies per ml in test 1 were analysed.
caption.p: Median and IQR for each temperature/storage category is given. Plus and minus 0.5log viral load change indicated by solid red lines.
